parameters.name: can_upload
parameters.description: Whether the viewer can upload photos to this album.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of photos in this album.

parameters.name: cover_photo
parameters.description: The ID of the album's cover photo.

parameters.name: created_time
parameters.description: The time the album was initially created.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event associated with this album.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The profile that created the album.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: A link to this album on Facebook.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The textual location of the album.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: The place associated with this album.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The privacy settings for the album.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The last time the album was updated.

parameters.description: You use this to get a pre-specified size of picture.
